I want to check it again, so do anyone know a website that cached it ?

Hi.
On LinkedIn,is it better uploading every certificate I get "like improving my English,time management, ...etc"  or uploading only what related to my specialization so im in electronic and comm. Dept. So upload what related to it "programming,M.L, embedded hardware...etc".???

Anyone here using cloud storage for personal, off-site backup purposes? Basically I need 1-2TB of storge space with the most important factor having an FTP or FTP-like access to upload and download (Web based upload sucks, and I don't want to auto sync files because this defeats the whole point of backup).

All for something like $10/month... I have been searching for a day and none of the mainstream solutions (GDrive, OneDrive, etc.) fits, neither I found a low-end VPS with such disk space... maybe you can enlighten me with your experience?

Thanks for your help!

Okay guys,
i always appreciate your advices, it's very helpful for me and it makes me always working hard on myself.
but now i have another annoying question :D
now i'm in a very sensitive situation, since i have video call interview tomorrow morning with Malaysian HR (female) about a vacancy based in Malaysia, she would like to talk about my experience, i think the average of this interview will be about 1 hour, any advice are appreciated (it's my first time to interview with foreign interviewer) :) 
thanks in advance :)

SA, Please i need to know the estimate salary for part time - remotely - from home - about 80 hours per month. the Responsibilities are web developer(.Net) and UI designer. By the way this is an egyptian startup company.
Thank you

Hi everyone, I need some advice ,
I got the chance to work in two companies,
The first one is a friendly, smart,experienced startup in my career (full stack .net developer) which I have 2 years working experience.
The second one is big company (IBM) but in another career Like (Integration).
What is the best thinking, work in my career and further my career experience or add value to my cv with big company name and in the hope of shifting to the development team one day.
Note: I'm not talking about salaries or benefits , I chose the startup company ,I would appreciate hearing from you
